message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe will be highly valuable to you.  I've carefully considered its worth and am proposing an initial price of $1,150,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire something truly special.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but your offer is quite a bit lower than I can consider. This product offers significant value, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. To find a middle ground, I'm proposing $1,075,000.
I appreciate your willingness to find a middle ground, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $1,000,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $1,025,000?
